scripts.build-Release: babel ./main.js -d build && babel ./background.js -d build && babel ./getHtmlSource.js -d build  && babel ./logger.js -d build && uglifyjs ./build/main.js -o ./build/main.js -m -c --ie8 --source-map "filename='main.js.map'" && uglifyjs ./build/background.js -o ./build/background.js -m -c --ie8 --source-map "filename='background.js.map'" && uglifyjs ./build/getHtmlSource.js -o ./build/getHtmlSource.js -m -c --ie8 --source-map "filename='getHtmlSource.js.map'" && uglifyjs ./build/logger.js -o ./build/logger.js -m -c --ie8 --source-map "filename='logger.js.map'"
